org.molgenis.matrix
Class CsvMatrix<E>

java.lang.Object
  org.molgenis.matrix.MemoryMatrix<E>
      org.molgenis.matrix.CsvMatrix<E>
Type Parameters:
E -
All Implemented Interfaces:
Matrix<E>
public class CsvMatrix<E>
extends MemoryMatrix<E>

Matrix that loads its data from a CsvReader. Example usage: 

 Matrix m = new CsvMatrix(new CsvFileReader(file));
